response.overview: The unsolved case is about a young woman named Devika, (suspect) who is said to be killed three men and ripped their bodies into pieces. All of this happened in a farm house far away from the city on one night. The only evidence in this case is a man who used to work in that farm house as a gardener but heâ€™s missing now. But according to Devika all the allegations which are recorded on the papers are just seemed to be a fairy tale written by the police authorities and for defending herself she is being treated in a mental hospital since past 1 year.
response.title: Samaikaari
